00019 class Service;

00028 class ConnectorListener : public MsgSocketCallbackObject
00029 {
00030     friend class Service;
00031 
00032 public:
00034     virtual ~ConnectorListener();
00035 
00044     virtual void MessageReceived(Service& TheService, const SimpleString LocalConnectorName, const Message& Msg);
00045 
00053     virtual void Connected(Service& TheService, const SimpleString LocalConnectorName, unsigned int PeerId);
00054 
00062     virtual void Disconnected(Service& TheService, const SimpleString LocalConnectorName, unsigned int PeerId);
00063 
00064 private:

00068     void Receive(MsgSocket& ConnectionPoint, MsgSocketCallBackData& CallbackData);
00069     void Connected(MsgSocket& ConnectionPoint, unsigned int PeerId);
00070     void Disconnected(MsgSocket& ConnectionPoint, unsigned int PeerId);
00071 
00087     class ExtendedMessageForService : public Message
00088     {
00089         // The class CollectorListener will create such
00090         friend class ConnectorListener;
00091 
00092     public:
00093         // Constructor
00094         ExtendedMessageForService(Message& ToCopy);
00095 
00096         // Destructor
00097         virtual ~ExtendedMessageForService();
00098 
00099         // Simple member to recall from wich connector we received the message
00100         SimpleString ReceivedFromConnector;
00101     };
